snippet.title: Quest for Infamy Publishing Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Why Be Famous When You Can Be Infamous? 

Return to the glory days of role-playing and adventure with this humor-filled fantasy epic, styled in the vein of classic PC RPGs, where you play the charming villain. Blending turn-based combat and spellcasting with puzzle solving and adventure, players can choose from three character classes—brigand (strength), rogue (stealth), or sorcerer (magic), each with unique storylines and adventures—in one of the largest retro role-playing experiences ever.Being bad has never felt so good! 

Phoenix Online Studios: http://www.postudios.com
Tumblr: http://postudios.tumblr.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PhoenixOnlineStudios
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/POStudios

Infamous Quests: http://www.infamous-quests.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IQ_Adventures
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InfamousQuests
